q_en: Which cutting tasks use Cotton Fabric?
gt:
Sure thing! Here are the cutting tasks that use **Cotton Fabric**:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Working Group   | Order Product ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status     |
|---------|------------------|------------------|-----------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|------------|
| 1       | 2024-01-10       | 2024-01-18       | Master Sewers   | 1                | 100            | 100              | Completed  |
| 2       | 2024-01-10       | 2024-02-02       | Master Cutters  | 2                | 240            | 240              | In Progress|
| 3       | 2024-01-10       | 2024-01-19       | Master Cutters  | 3                | 150            | 150              | Completed  |
| 4       | 2024-01-10       | 2024-01-17       | Master Sewers   | 4                | 220            | 220              | In Progress|
| 5       | 2024-01-10       | 2024-02-02       | Master Sewers   | 5                | 260            | 260              | In Progress|
| 19      | 2024-03-18       | 2024-04-12       | Expert Cutters  | 19               | 95             | 95               | In Progress|
| 21      | 2024-03-18       | 2024-04-04       | Expert Cutters  | 21               | 85             | 85               | In Progress|
| 28      | 2024-04-19       | 2024-05-12       | Master Sewers   | 28               | 210            | 210              | In Progress|
| 31      | 2024-05-10       | 2024-05-26       | Master Cutters  | 31               | 260            | 260              | In Progress|
| 34      | 2024-06-30       | 2024-07-10       | Expert Cutters  | 34               | 330            | 0                | Not Started|

The status is represented as:
- **Completed**: All tasks are done! üéâ
- **In Progress**: Tasks are ongoing. Keep up the good work! üí™
- **Not Started**: Tasks are yet to begin. ‚è≥

If you have any more questions, feel free to ask! üòä

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Cotton Fabric';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM warehouse_material WHERE material_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the warehouse material IDs that correspond to the material ID for "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT cutting_task_id FROM cutting_material_allocation WHERE warehouse_material_id IN ('1');
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs that use the warehouse material IDs for "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.id AS order_product_id, ct.planned_number, ct.completed_number, ct.status FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id WHERE ct.id IN ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '19', '21', '28', '31', '34');
steps.description: Retrieve the details of the cutting tasks that use "Cotton Fabric"
